mapper.insert: insert into emp (posNum, empId, empName, pwd, retire) values(#{posNum},#{empId},#{empName},#{pwd},#{retire})
mapper.select: select empId, posNum, empName, pwd from emp Where empId=#{empId} and posNum=#{posNum}
select empId, posNum, empName, pwd from emp Where empId=#{empId} and posNum=#{posNum} and pwd=#{pwd} and retire=1
mapper.update: update emp set empId=#{empId}, posNum=#{posNum}, empName=#{empName}, pwd=#{pwd} Where empId=#{empId} and posNum=#{posNum}
mapper.delete: update emp set retire=0 where empId=#{empId} and posNum=#{posNum}
mapper.select: select empId, posNum, empName, pwd, retire from emp where posNum =#{posNum} order by retire desc
